title: Choosing The Right Training Environment To Build Confidence
excerpt: Top athletes share insights on ambition, resilience, and strategic race planning. Femke Bol highlights the importance of specific training locations favored by coaches.
body:
Femke Bolâ€™s coach recently emphasized the importance of training in Silesia, a specific location known for conditions that favor strategic preparation. This decision came as the team aimed to maximize readiness before a major race under tight timing constraints. Their choice to focus on environment, rather than only workouts, marks a deliberate effort to cultivate confidence through tailored surroundings.

For runners at any level, this highlights how confidence can grow not just from physical training but also from making thoughtful decisions about where and how to train. Recognizing that mental assurance is built through attention to detail and environment reminds us that sometimes confidence requires stepping outside usual routines. Embracing this mindset can deepen trust in your preparation when you face race day challenges.
keyTakeaway: Notice how your training environment impacts your confidence and adapt your routines to foster belief in your readiness.
